comment.author: 22158345@N02
comment._content: Activist and director of the Pioneer Fund. www.pioneerfund.org Wiki: "Eugenie Mary "May" Ladenburg Davie (1895–September 19, 1975) was a noted Republican activist in New York and a director of the controversial Pioneer Fund at the end of her life. She was second wife to influential lawyer Preston Davie." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eugenie_Mary_Ladenburg_Davie
